subject: Re: [junit] assert keywork
msgSnippet: Shouldn t you be using one of the assert* methods instead of the Java keyword, or do you have a reason not to? -Filip ... [Non-text portions of this message
messageBody:
Shouldn't you be using one of the assert* methods instead of the Java
keyword, or do you have a reason not to?

-Filip

albamatiit wrote:
>
>
> I use JUnit in Eclipse 3.0. When an assert (java keyword) fail, the
> test go on instead of terminate with an error. How can I detect an
> assert failure in tests?
> Bye
> Alberto
>
>
>
